snippet: The Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ended at record highs, without adjustment for inflation, while the Nasdaq rose for an eighth day.
abstract: Stock markets respond favorably to Greek and eurozone finance ministers reaching deal to extend Greece's financial rescue, with Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500-stock index ending at record highs.
lead_paragraph: The Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index ended at record highs, without adjustment for inflation, while the Nasdaq rose for an eighth day.

headline.main: Shares Rise as Greek Bailout Is Extended
headline.print_headline: Shares Rise as Greek Bailout Is Extended
